extendedInfo.description: An easy to use, kid friendly paintbrush / sketch / coloring book app with toddler lock. Parents can feel comfortable that their child will not make calls, open other apps, or delete things. Includes save and open features so kids doodles / drawings can be saved and edited.The multi-touch is enabled on this app which makes it more fun for kids and lets them keep drawing even if they accidentally are touching the screen with the hand holding the device. (Note: the multi-touch is flaky on some devices, this has to do with bugs in the API) Features:â Toddler/child lock.â Easy to use design for young children.â Toddler mode with sounds and random colors/effectsâ Save kids doodles and sketches.â Multi-touch enabled so accidental touches don't keep. child from being able to draw. â Lock works on Ice Cream Sandwich.â Coloring book drawings(NOTE: Free version WILL open browser or go to android market if an ad is clicked. Only one ad will be shown per session. Get Toddler Paint Pro for full locking feature.)This App IS NOT a virus! Some antivirus apps will say it is but that is simply because they detect the ad network which is capable of serving push notification ads. There are NO push notification ads on this app.This version has ads. Every effort has been made to insure age appropriate ads. If you want an ad free version download "Toddler Paint Pro" for $0.99. Before Letting your child use your phone we recommend setting a pin code on the Google Play app. This will keep your child from accidentally purchasing apps. This can be set up by opening the play store, going to the settings menu and clicking "set or change pin"other names for lock: Toddler lock, kid lock, Parental control, child safe, kid safe, pocket change.

reviews.title: Great multi touch doodler
reviews.comment: This is a nice doodling and coloring app. I like that my daughter can still draw when she has the thumb of her other hand on the screen. I also like that she and I can draw on the screen at the same time.
reviews.author: Ken Norton

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Works well locks good would like some flashing or something just to keep there eyes On screen abit more.
reviews.author: Martin Maplethorpe

reviews.title: fab app
reviews.comment: my 3 and 5 year old daughters LOVE this app. lots of differant effects. plain paper to draw on plus pictures and the noises are cool! they love it. best drawing app ive downloaded so far
reviews.author: Jay Silcock

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It would be good if you could fill the colors on colorung pages instead of drawing them in. Great app otherwise.
reviews.author: emma vivian

reviews.comment: It doesnt lock everything and dies ratger easily open other stuff when oainting..she randomly clicks and ut leaves the oage
reviews.author: Jackie Jennetten

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: I\'d recommend this app to anyone that has a toddler that is obsessed or in love with electronics lol! My 3 year old son will steal my phone just to play this game! Love the toddler lock bonus too!
reviews.author: Jacque Di Nieri

reviews.title: Love the advanced lock.
reviews.comment: Love how there are two steps to exit the app! Great job. Love the sound effects as well
reviews.author: Jessica Macintire

reviews.title: Brilliant little app
reviews.comment: In the free version the ads aren\'t too intrusive and the child lock works really well.
reviews.author: Andrew Barr

reviews.title: Was happy
reviews.comment: My daughter loves this app but the ads she accidentally clicks on and just got notified by my virus protector that it has intrusive ads. Immediately un installed. Sorry. Fix the intrusive part and I would download again.
reviews.author: Jennifer Salisbury

reviews.title: Cute idea and would perfect if pictures were unlocked!!!!!
reviews.comment: My 3yr old loves it but complains she cant color with all the colors and cant use all the pics either which is ghetto!!!!!
reviews.author: Kathleen Eheler

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: My 2 year old son loves this app! Recommend this to any parent as long as the children are supervised.
reviews.author: Amber Lambrix

reviews.title: Toodler approved
reviews.comment: App is easy enough for my 3 year old son to use.....and keeps him entertained.
reviews.author: Sonia Aguilar

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This is a really good app for my little sister ahe really enjoys it and she cant get off it to mess up my phone !!!
reviews.author: hannah downie

reviews.title: Not toddler locked! The ad interface works! Don\'t install.
reviews.comment: My baby clicked on an ad and I had to pull my battery to get the app to close.
reviews.author: Rebecca Schibler

reviews.title: Son was on ads more than app
reviews.comment: I got this app to prevent my one year old from getting into my phone and to keep him occupied. I had to delete it because he didn\'t even color. Just clicked on the ads and tried to buy apps. He really wasn\'t that interested in the app anyways...off to find something better!
reviews.author: Alicia H

reviews.title: Omg
reviews.comment: I got this for my son and I play with it more often then he does. great app for the little ones.
reviews.author: Sarah Peters

reviews.title: Daughter likes it
reviews.comment: Don\'t like that the child can click on the advertisements. Guess this is why you buy the full version.
reviews.author: autumn nash

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: Its pretty convenient so my little baby doesn\'t get into my business you should download it
reviews.author: Niecy Raymond

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: My two year old thinks its so cool to play on mom\'s phone
reviews.author: Cassandra Falany

reviews.title: Ads Not Locked
reviews.comment: Ads can be clicked on by a child and then be taken (in my case) the Play Store to buy an app. Nope!!!
reviews.author: Tiffany Arns
